Intro_Wimp.questDescriptionRules.rulesSt.li:
questDescription->[asker_nameFull], a [asker_royalTitleInCurrentFaction] of [asker_faction_name] is calling from nearby. [asker_possessive] guards were killed in an ambush. [asker_pronoun] escaped, but is now being followed by (*Threat)a manhunting [animalKindDef_label](/Threat).

[asker_nameDef] wants you to keep [asker_objective] safe at [map_definite] for a few hours until [asker_possessive] shuttle can come pick [asker_objective] up.

[asker_pronoun] will bestow [royalFavorReward] [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] on whoever accepts this quest. This is enough [asker_faction_royalFavorLabel] to receive the royal title of Yeoman, and all benefits that come with it - including the first level of psychic powers.

LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.LetterTextAnimalArrived.slate: [asker_nameDef](이)가 도망치던 \"치명적인\" [animalKindDef_label](이)가 도착했습니다.\n\n꽤 얌전하고 온순하여 공격적이지 않은걸로 밝혀졌습니다.
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.LetterTextUnauthorizedSurgery: 보호해야 될 {SUBJECT_definite}에게 승인되지 않은 수술이 실행되었습니다. 이 위반으로 인해 [asker_pronoun]는 떠나려고 합니다. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.root.nodes.askerXenogermAbsor: {SUBJECT_definite}, who you were charged to protect, has had {SUBJECT_possessive} xenogerm forcibly absorbed. Because of this violation, {SUBJECT_pronoun} will now attempt to leave. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.LetterTextGuestLost.slateRef: 보호해야 할 책임이 있는 {SUBJECT_definite}(이)가 지정된 정착지에서 떠났습니다. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.LetterTextShuttleDestroyed.sl: [asker_nameDef](을)를 데리러 온 왕복선이 파괴되었습니다. [asker_pronoun]는 걸어서 떠납니다. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.Intro_Wimp.LetterTextQuestFailed.slateRe: [asker_nameDef](을)를 데리러 온 왕복선이 [asker_objective] 태우지 않고 떠났습니다. [asker_pronoun]는 걸어서 떠납니다. [failLetterEndingCommon]
